name: Sanguine Heir
description:
Slay monsters and explore dungeons while collecting legendary loot! Sanguine Heir is a loot-based ARPG Hack-n-Slash Dungeon Crawler inspired by PC games of the early 2000s. If you would like to support the company please visit my GoFundMe poge

Sanguine Heir features:

  • 3 Distinct classes
  • 15 skills for each class that can be upgraded 20 times
  • Infinitely replayable "terror realm" mode that features a random assortment of dungeon layouts.
Combat

Combat in Sanguine Heir revolves around your 6 skill slots into which you can socket any of your attack skills. The power of these attacks are augmented by your passive skills and currently equipped items.
